title: 3Blue1Brown - Neural Networks
comment: The best visual introduction to how neural networks actually work.

title: Notion
comment: This tool has saved my University life. Here I store all my notes and assignments, and it makes extremely easy to share it with others.

title: StatQuest with Josh Starmer
comment: Awesome channel that easily explains statistics and ML in a way that is easy to understand.

title: The Coding Train (Daniel Shiffman)
comment: My first CS teacher, who introduced me to the world of programming.

title: Straight White Male by John Niven
comment: One of my favorite books. If you can go beyond the title, is an interesting novel on love lived as a male individual.

title: Nature of Code by Daniel Shiffman
comment: Awesome book on how to express (in Javascript) some netural phenomena.

title: Artem Kirsanov
comment: Some of the best videos I have foudn on Youtube regarding Neuroscience

title: Primer
comment: Relaxing videos on Game Theory and simulations, useful to chill out before sleeping

title: Sebastian Lague
comment: Very nice videos on Game Design, specifically on the technical side and on how GPUs work. Very interesting also for the general CS audience.

title: These Repo by BSML
comment: Some thesis examples by Bocconi students, collected thorugh my association Bocconi Students for Machine Learning

title: Terroni by Pino Aprile
comment: Great book regarding the "Questione meridionale", the disparity between North and South Italy
